text: @realDonaldTrump For everyone who thinks Covid19 isn't dangerous enough to warrant public restrictions... Do you people get flu shots or vaccines even take medication for a medical disorder? Wear seatbelts, lock your doors, look both ways before crossing a road? It's called preventive care...
